name: Immersion
description:
In this game your target is go away from immortal monster. On your way will be enemies and challanges. There is no escape and the only end - death. Complete as much floors as you can and kill enemies. Floors generating randomly, so every floor will be different geometry, location of enemies and weapons, etc. You can collect weapons: shotguns, rifles, pistols, axes and other.

In game pretty good gore: blood from enemies throws like a drops and it can make blood puddles; after enemy dies spawns animated blood puddle, like in old games; there is dismemberment (for head, arms, legs) after shooting them will appear meat and bones particles, also will be harder to shoot enemy, because of correct collision.

High-quality physics is one of the most important elements that immerses the player in the virtual world. The game has a huge number of different physical objects: corpses, bottles, mirrors, weapons, lamps, shells and much more. There is also a different reaction of objects to bullets (limbs are broken into pieces of meat, bottles are broken, etc.)

In game no cutscenes, dramatic storyline, etc. No storyline at all. It's just a game, which maden to make u have fun from gameplay.
